caption: It's a local fusion place. Nothing too fancy but the food is fresh & good. I like some Philly Rolls and and Chicken Lo Mein. Nice mix. I highly recommend Masake not just for the food. Good people here. When my dog developed stomach issues they would hook up special meals for her that were within the guidelines of what she could have. I'll never forget them for that reason alone but the cherry on the pie is that Mom really likes their food, too.

This is a small sushi place on Avenue M. It is a quiet spot to go to. The employees have been there for years, and are quite nice. I am a regular at this spot ( when it is open).  I love to order an assortment of individual nigiri and sashimi pieces so that I can sample each taste.  This place is usually pretty empty, so it is great if you like some peace and tranquility as you eat. I have spent several hours in this restaurant just slowly eating and chatting with my friends.  I have also gotten a lot of takeout from this place, especially since covid 19 shut everything down. They are always timely with my deliveries, and have not gotten an order wrong with me.  The food here is inexpensive as well, and when you order sushi like I do, those dollars and cents start to add up very quickly!
The Food is good but they have messed up my order multiple times, the delivery person always demands a tip, I suggest ordering from another place if you prefer having good service.
my favored place to get miso soup! very good quality and reasonable prices. would recommend to anyone

Idk why there are so many bad reviews but this is our go to place. Maybe on occasion the sushi hasn't been the tastiest or freshest but but on most occasions it is. I will not give a bad review because of one or two times although I really feel for the other reviewer with the centipede. 🤮 😳
Ordered sushi tray A tonight. Food had no taste. All 3 of us had a stomach ache after having a dinner here... never again
It's a neighborhood staple even though we live in a predominantly Jewish neighborhood!

This place is around the corner from me and cheap, with good quality sushi so it was always the go to. However within the past two years, not only is the delivery guy rude and aggressive (sometimes would even hesitate giving you the food) if you don’t tip him exactly how much he wants, but the most recent experience was not the greatest due to being given expired spicy mayo- and it was pretty evident too. On every occasion, the sushi was kinda sloppy and not completely filled in- but you get what you paid for.

Just got cursed out by the delivery person for tipping $1.50 on an $11 order....home sick just ordered wonton soup rice and ginger ale and he wasn’t going to give me my food because of the tip- I ordered quickly on seamless and just kept the default settings, I was not trying to ripoff anyone as I’ve worked in the food industry myself. I would have offered to find some cash to appease him but his behavior was absolutely disgusting. I had to grab my food from him as he was causing a scene in my building. I’ve been ordering from them for 3.5 years and never will again.
Amazing we always go there with my friend and they know us very well and very friendly and very tasty foods.. I SWEAR YOU ALL ARE MISSING OUT..
The place is good and cheap. We ordered Japanese pizza and it was a great choice.  Even if rolls were not properly made  and felt apart, they were delicious. 😊
We had the Land Box appetizers & the mango chicken with fried rice.  It was  wonderful!

Do not eat here, you have been warned. I wish I read the last review that was posted before this one prior to ordering. We ordered delivery; some Chinese food and some sushi. The Chinese food was fine, standard middling quality. As I went to move to the sushi, something caught my eye. It was a millipede crawling all over the sushi and rolls inside the still-sealed container. It was one of the most disgusting sights I've ever seen and I completely lost my appetite. When I called to complain the woman pretended to not understand English enough to register what I was complaining about. When they put someone else on the phone and I was able to make him understand, he said it was "not possible" - I explained that I was looking at it and it was most certainly possible, he still refused to address my complaint. I figured, no point in arguing, so I hung up and wrote this review.

Been to the restaurant once.  Cheap food and no service Food is not tasty.  Poor sanitation. The kitchen is not wearing a hat.  Without gloves, hygiene is poor.  Milk tea has a strange smell.  Kung Pao Chicken The chickens are smelly.  Scallion cakes contain cockroaches and tuna sashimi with parasites.  I decided not to eat later

When I first started ordering from here, the sushi was great and incredibly fresh. But lately, it seems that the quality has deteriorated. My biggest issue though is that the delivery guy always complains about no parking and never wants to come up just one flight of stairs to deliver my order. His usual complaint is that there's no parking but I order from various restaurants that usually deliver right to my door. On top of that, he calls you to come downstairs when he hasn't even arrived! If this continues, I will have no choice but to start ordering from my previous sushi spot again... That delivers to my door.

When MA Sake is good they are great. When they aren't great,  they are like everyone else.  They need the chef to crack down on the kitchen because they are sonetimes special. Come on guys, be number 1 everytime
